summary: Artes Magicae - The Magical Arts aims to add many unique and useful spells while also keeping the balance on the game intact.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][color=cyan][b][font=arial][size=8]Artes Magicae - The Magical Arts[/heading][/color][/size][/b][/font][/center]
[font=arial][size=3]
[b][color=red][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] and [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] are required to use this mod properly![/b][/color]

[b][color=yellow]Visit the Main Forum topic for this mod [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1437040-wipzrelz-artes-magicae-the-magical-arts]here.[/url][/b][/color]
[/font][/size]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img32/9329/notess.jpg[/img][/center][list]
[*]If you have any bugs or incompatibilities please send me a message or comment. Attaching the papyrus log would be helpful!
[*]This mod is currently only in a very early release and is therefore incomplete!
[*]This version is the vanilla version but Dawnguard and Dragonborn versions will be added at a later date.
[*]Currently all new spells can be added via the MCM Menu spell tomes may be added at a later date.
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/1930/aimr.jpg[/img][/center]Artes Magicae - The Magical Arts is a mod dedicated to improving the magic system in Skyrim by adding new spells and tweaking old ones as necessary.


[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/622/featuresz.jpg[/img][/center][list]
[*]Edited vanilla spell and tome names to allow for better sorting.
[*]Added 14 new spells.
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img5/1258/nextupdate.jpg[/img][/center][list]
[*] Information coming soon.
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img267/5889/addedspells.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=4][b]ALTERATION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Mark
[*]Recall
[*]Transmute Ingot
[*]Feather I
[*]Feather II
[*]Feather III
[*]Feather IV
[/list]

[size=4][b]RESTORATION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Cure - Disease
[*]Cure - Poison
[*]Cure - Paralysis
[*]Shield - Fire
[*]Shield - Frost
[*]Shield - Shock
[*]Shield - Magic
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img267/2842/installationb.jpg[/img][/center]Extract the .7z file and put the .BSA and the .ESP into your Skyrim Data directory, or simply install using the Nexus Mod Manager.

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img59/1087/knownincompatibilities.jpg[/img][/center][list]
[*][b]Better Sorting:[/b] When using this with Better Sorting disable the \"Spells\" module of Better Sorting and if you want to get my Tome names while keeping Better Sorting book names make sure the Artes Magicae is lower than Better Sorting \"Books\" module on the load order.
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img819/8134/knownbugs.jpg[/img][/center][list]
[*][b]None![/b]
[/list]

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img542/6567/namechanges.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=4][b]DESTRUCTION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Flames = Spray - Fire 
[*]Firebolt = Missile - Fire I
[*]Fire Rune = Rune - Fire 
[*]Fireball = Area Missile - Fire 
[*]Flame Cloak = Cloak - Fire 
[*]Incinerate = Missile - Fire II
[*]Wall of Flames = Wall - Fire 
[*]Fire Storm = Storm - Fire 
[*]Frostbite = Spray - Frost 
[*]Ice Spike = Missile - Frost I
[*]Frost Rune = Rune - Frost 
[*]Ice Storm = Area Missile - Frost 
[*]Frost Cloak = Cloak - Frost 
[*]Icy Spear = Missile - Frost II
[*]Wall of Frost = Wall - Frost 
[*]Blizzard = Storm - Frost 
[*]Sparks = Spray - Shock 
[*]Lightning Bolt = Missile - Shock I
[*]Lightning Rune = Rune - Shock
[*]Chain Lightning = Area Missile - Shock 
[*]Lightning Cloak = Cloak - Shock 
[*]Thunderbolt = Missile - Shock II
[*]Wall of Storms = Wall - Shock 
[*]Lightning Storm = Storm - Shock 
[/list]

[size=4][b]ALTERATION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Transmute Ore = Transmute - Ore
[*]Paralyze = Paralyze
[*]Mass Paralyze = Paralyze - Mass
[*]Detect Life = Detect - Living
[*]Detect Dead = Detect - Undead
[*]Oakflesh = Magic Armour I
[*]Stoneflesh = Magic Armour II
[*]Ironflesh = Magic Armour III
[*]Ebonyflesh = Magic Armour IV
[*]Dragonhide = Magic Armour - Dragonhide
[/list]

[size=4][b]CONJURATION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Conjure Familiar = Conjure - Familiar
[*]Conjure Boneman = Conjure - Boneman (Dawnguard)
[*]Conjure Flame Atronach = Conjure - Flame Atronach
[*]Flaming Familiar = Conjure - Flaming Familiar
[*]Conjure Frost Atronach = Conjure - Frost Atronach
[*]Conjure Mistman = Conjure - Mistman (Dawnguard)
[*]Conjure Dragon Priest = Conjure - Dragon Priest
[*]Conjure Dremora Lord = Conjure - Dremora Lord
[*]Conjure Storm Atronach = Conjure - Storm Atronach
[*]Conjure Wrathman = Conjure - Wrathman (Dawnguard)
[*]Flame Thrall = Conjure - Flame Thrall
[*]Frost Thrall = Conjure - Frost Thrall
[*]Strom Thrall = Conjure - Storm Thrall
[*]Raise Zombie = Reanimate I
[*]Reanimate Corpse = Reanimate II
[*]Revenant = Reanimate III
[*]Dread Zombie = Reanimate IV
[*]Dead Thrall = Reanimate - Thrall
[*]Bound Sword = Bound - Sword
[*]Bound Battleaxe = Bound - Battleaxe
[*]Bound Bow = Bound - Bow
[/list]

[size=4][b]ILLUSION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Fury = Fury 
[*]Frenzy = Fury - Mass I
[*]Mayhem = Fury - Mass II
[*]Courage = Courage
[*]Rally = Courage - Mass 
[*]Calm = Calm 
[*]Pacify = Calm - Mass I
[*]Harmony = Calm - Mass II
[*]Fear = Fear 
[*]Rout = Fear - Mass I
[*]Hysteria = Fear - Mass II
[/list]

[size=4][b]RESTORATION[/b][/size][list]
[*]Healing = Heal I
[*]Fast Healing = Heal II
[*]Close Wounds = Heal III
[*]Healing Hands = Heal - Living I
[*]Heal Other = Heal - Living II
[*]Necromantic Healing = Heal - Undead I (Dawnguard)
[*]Heal Undead = Heal - Undead II (Dawnguard)
[*]Grand Healing = Heal - Mass 
[*]Lesser Ward = Ward I
[*]Steadfast Ward = Ward II
[*]Greater Ward = Ward III
[*]Sun Fire = Damage Undead (Dawnguard)
[*]Vampire\'s Bane = Damage Undead - Mass (Dawnguard)
[*]Turn Lesser Undead = Turn Undead I
[*]Turn Undead = Turn Undead II
[*]Turn Greater Undead = Turn Undead III
[*]Repel Lesser Undead = Repel Undead I
[*]Repel Undead = Repel Undead II
[/list]
author: kingjbc
